title: EMPIRE STATE BUILDING
short_description: The Empire State Building is the most iconic landmark in New York City, and the most famous office building in the country.
seo_description: The Empire State Building is the most iconic landmark in New York City, and the most famous office building in the country.
detailpage_description: The Empire State Building is the most iconic landmark in New York City, and the most famous office building in the country. Rising 1,454 feet above the ground, the ESB was known as the tallest building in the world for more than 40 years. This famous building features observatory decks on the 86th and 102nd floor, offering visitors panoramic views of New York City and beyond.
